name: scheduler-system
description: A fully functional scheduler system with recurring weekly slots and exception handling

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && serve -s build -l 3000"
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test

author: OpenHands
